article.title: General Atomics to Modify Two MQ-9 Reapers
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems, Poway, California, is being awarded a $38,398,042 firm-price-incentive-firm and firm-fixed-price contract to procure two modified Block 1 MQ-9 Aircraft and two aircraft containers.Â Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
